Introduction

Hyunny is a South Korean singer and rapper formely under EgoENT. She was the leader of the girl group VVUP. She is best known for being a contestant on the survival show My Teenage Girl. Her final rank was 11th place.

On August 29th 2024 EgoENT announced her departure from VVUP due to continues health issuses.
